item.title: My experience solving AOC problems
item.description: Intro # Advent of Code is a series of problems that are presented to the public every year during the month of December. Here’s more information: adventOfCode Repo # This post is dedicated to the problems of 2015, but in this repository, you will find my solutions for this and other years.
